title: What are criticisms of collectivism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Briefly, that it encourages and enhances the herd mentality - “Do not think for yourself, leave that to the bosses.” Keep that up for a few centuries, under the Tsars, then Lenin, then Stalin - and you end up with Russia. Putin might be thought to be (hoped to be ?) in the process of trying to correct centuries of such distortions - but then again, he might not. ’Twould be very hard for him to do it - hard for anyone to even try. The West, the Industrial REvolution, modernity, are the result of about three centuries of working at an alternative. It is a BIG job, takes a LLLLLOOOONNNNG time, and has many dangers and difficulties on the way. We have now reached what might best be characterised as “Post-Collectivism” - but the Marxists are still working hard to pull us back. As are the Religious. Whatever god can help us now ?
